How to contribute¶

Thank you for considering it!

If you found a bug, have ideas about new functionality or suggestions to improve PacBio Data Processing, including its documentation, please, visit our repository hosted in Gitlab (https://gitlab.com/dvelazquez/pacbio-data-processing) and have a look at the issues.

If you want to contribute with code, please, have a look at our Development notes. Hopefully they help you understand how we develop PacBio Data Processing. But feel free to ask or to create an issue in our Gitlab page https://gitlab.com/dvelazquez/pacbio-data-processing if you feel confused about how to start contributing.
